title: DV_URI
description:
A reference to an object which conforms to the Universal Resource Identifier (URI) standard. See "Universal Resource Identifiers in WWW" by Tim Berners-Lee at http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt. This  is  a  World-Wide  Web  RFC for  global identification  of resources. 
See http://www.w3.org/Addressing for a starting point on URIs.
$comments: Defined in Data_types IM, inherits from DATA_VALUE

value.description: Value of URI as a String.
